page.name: Familiarize yourself with UDL (Presentation)
page.intro: Watch this short video to familiarize yourself with the concept of universal design for learning. Select the video, Principles and Practice, in the series from The National Center for UDL.
page.content:
Watch this short video, UDL: Principles and Practice, to familiarize yourself with the concept of universal design for learning. This video is hosted by National UDL Center  and is on a different site. After viewing and/or listening to the video, please return to the course.

About this Video

National Center on UDL Director David Rose explains how UDL helps meet the most pressing issues facing educators today. Drawing on brain research and the latest learning sciences, Dr. Rose describes the three UDL principles and what they mean for classroom practice.
